name: Stichting Adaptant Foundation
goal: As a classical Think-and-Do Tank, the goal of the Foundation is two-fold: (1) To carry out advanced interdisciplinary research in the fields of privacy-preservation and ethical data usage, providing thought leadership, raising awareness, and advancing policy; (2) supporting organisations in the development of privacy-preserving and ethical data-driven products, solutions, and services.
interests: Business and Industry, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, General and Institutional Affairs, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
- ePrivacy Regulation
- Digital Single Market Strategy
- Free flow of non-personal data
- Regulation (EU) 2016/679 (GDPR)
- NIS Directive
